articles.title: Court rules Elon Musk broke federal labor law with 2018 tweet - Engadget
articles.description: Elon Musk broke US labor law in 2018 when he tweeted Tesla factory workers would forgo stock options if they chose to unionize, according to a new court ruling..
articles.content:

articles.title: EPA approves California rules phasing out diesel trucks - KSBY News
articles.description: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency is clearing the way for California rules that will phase out the sale of diesel-powered trucks.
